channel.title: Pages on Johnny's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Johnny's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: .about-brief { margin: auto; max-width: 540px; text-align: center; position: relative; margin-bottom: 40px; } .about-brief p { margin: 1.5em; } .about-brief li { margin-right: 1.5rem !important; } .about-brief i { font-size: 24px; } .social { margin-top: 3rem!important; margin-bottom: 0!important; padding-left: 0; list-style: none; } .social li:not(:last-child) { margin-right: 1.5rem; } .social li { list-style: none; display: inline-block; } .askme { margin-top: 1.5rem!important; } .btn { cursor: pointer; color: #FFF; background: #FF4C60; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; transform: perspective(1px) translateZ(0); box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0%); border-radius: 10px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; overflow: hidden; line-height: 1; padding: 16px 36px; } .
